definition: five crops, e.g. millet 粟[su4], soybean 豆[dou4], sesame 麻[ma2], barley 麥|麦[mai4], rice 稻[dao4] or other variants/all crops/all grains/oats, peas, beans and barley
abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
never move your four limbs, can't distinguish the five crops (idiom); living as a parasite
pinyin: si4 ti3 bu4 qin2 , wu3 gu3 bu4 fen1

sentences.english: Both has the fertile soil fertile farmland, bumper grain harvest, and has the broad prairie, a hundred flowers in full bloom.
sentences.chinese: 既有沃土良田，五谷丰登，又有广阔草原，百花盛开。

sentences.english: You are to give them the firstfruits of your grain, new wine and oil, and the first wool from the shearing of your sheep
sentences.chinese: 初收的五谷，新酒和油，并初剪的羊毛，也要给他。

sentences.english: Yan not only, still tube tube sun grain and medicine.
sentences.chinese: 炎帝不仅管太阳，还管五谷和药材。

sentences.english: Mixed Corn and Grains, Egg Yolk & Lotus Paste, Imperial Pineapple.
sentences.chinese: 五谷杂粮，蛋黄白莲，至尊凤梨。

sentences.english: Sent a bumper grain harvest in the autumn, dancing snowflakes in winter has finally arrived.
sentences.chinese: 送走了五谷丰登的秋天，雪花飞舞的冬天终于来临了。
没有五谷杂粮人类就不能生存。

sentences.english: Nature, very oddly, when the horn of plenty is quite empty, always fills it with babies.
sentences.chinese: 说也奇怪，大自然不丰赐五谷时，却往往多降婴儿。

sentences.english: Therefore God give thee of the dew of heaven, and the fatness of the earth, and plenty of corn and wine
sentences.chinese: 愿神赐你天上的甘露，地上的肥土，并许多五谷新酒。

sentences.english: May God give you of heaven's dew and of earth's richness—an abundance of grain and new wine.
sentences.chinese: 愿神赐你天上的甘露，地上的肥土，并许多五谷新酒。

sentences.english: In good years corn is hay, in ill years straw is corn.
sentences.chinese: 丰年五谷贱如草，荒年稻草贵如粮。

sentences.english: Eat more fruits, vegetables, and whole grains, and eat fewer high-fat foods.
sentences.chinese: 多吃水果，蔬菜，五谷杂粮以及低脂食物。

sentences.english: When divine farming cultivates food crops , I did not eat fireworks to feed already.
sentences.chinese: 神农种植五谷时，我早已不吃烟火食了。

sentences.english: This year we had a bumper grain harvest, which made my grandmother very happy.
sentences.chinese: 今年又是五谷丰登，奶奶脸上笑开了花。

sentences.english: Calm weather in June sets corn in tune.
Men can not always eat flour and rice, it is good for health to eat some cereals.
sentences.chinese: 人不能总吃细粮，吃点五谷杂粮也是有益健康的。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
all the grains/every kind of cereal crop
abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
six domestic animals, namely: pig, cow, sheep, horse, chicken and dog
highland barley (grown in Tibet and Qinghai)/qingke barley
